name: PHYSICS - 32 YEAR NEET PAST PAPER WITH SOLUTION
description: NEET Chapter-wise Solved Papers PHYSICS is the thoroughly revised & updated App and it contains the past year papers of NEET 2019 to 1988.  Revised & Updated Chapter-wise MCQs for NEET is a collection of selected MCQs for Medical entrance exams. This App follows the pattern of 11th and 12th syllabus as prescribed by NCERT.  The App contains Chapter-wise MCQs which covers all the important topics. The App contains 28 chapters covering a total of around 1670+ MCQs followed by solution.  The answers of the questions is given at the bottom of screen inside Hint button. The answers have been given in such a manner that a student can easily understand it.  App Includes following Topics #TREND ANALYSIS & SYLLABUS  Ch_01 UNITS & MEASUREMENTS Ch_02 MOTION IN A STRAIGHT LINE Ch_03 MOTION IN A PLANE Ch_04 LAWS OF MOTION Ch_05 WORK ENERGY & POWER Ch_06 SYSTEM OF PARTICLES & ROTATIONAL MOTION Ch_07 GRAVITATION Ch_08 MECHANICAL PROPERTIES OF SOLIDS Ch_09 MECHANICAL PROPERTIES OF FLUIDS Ch_10 THERMAL PROPERTIES OF MATTER Ch_11 THERMODYNAMICS Ch_12 KINETIC THEORY Ch_13 OSCILLATIONS Ch_14 WAVES Ch_15 ELECTRIC CHARGES & FIELDS Ch_16 ELECTROSTATIC POTENTIAL & CAPACITANCE Ch_17 CURRENT ELECTRICITY Ch_18 MOVING CHARGES & MAGNETISM Ch_19 MAGNETISM AND MATTER Ch_20 ELECTROMAGNETIC INDUCTION Ch_21 ALTERNATING CURRENT Ch_22 ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES Ch_23 RAY OPTICS AND OPTICAL INSTRUMENTS Ch_24 WAVE OPTICS Ch_25 DUAL NATURE OF RADIATION & MATTER Ch_26 ATOMS Ch_27 NUCLEI Ch_28 SEMICONDUCTOR ELECTRONICS: MATERIAL, DEVICES & CIRCUITS  The chapters have been divided as per the Class 11th & 12th syllabus followed by the NCERT books. Some of the chapters which are split in the class 11th & 12th syllabus in NCERT have been combined. There might be certain topics! chapters which are not covered in NCERT but are a part of NEET syllabus.
